name: Stallions (BY Furry Anthro)
description:
** Check out my other furry models at: https://yeen.beer **

Here is a Dreambooth model trained on Stallions (Anthro with equine penises). Trained on about 426 images from e621/FurF, 7000 steps over ye18 model.

Setup:

Just place the file in your models\Stable-diffusion folder. It works exactly the same as a custom model! Make sure to select it in settings, and apply! Use: Alright so you are going to get a decent looking random horse, (I don't know what breed). HOWEVER the equine penis can get a little funky, so get ready to inpaint! Most examples below are done around 30-50 steps (euler a) with a lot of inpainting. I disabled 'Restore faces' & occasional enabled 'Highres. fix' (0.6ish) for my prompts below.

Example Euler a Prompt:

Positive: upload on e621, by Garmash,Ruan Jia, chunie, darkgem, anthro, male, ((( detailed fluffy fur))), ((sitting)), detailed realistic painting, (((biceped))), (((shaded))) extreme detail, ((nococklikehorsecock)), (barn), outside, (balls), muscle gut, bodily fluid:1.3,

Negative prompt: deformed mutated disfigured hands, clothing, text, signature, patreon, speech bubble, watermark, simple background, sketch, comic, out of frame, long_body, Simple background, blurry, dark, female, vaginal penetration

Steps: 32, Sampler: Euler a, CFG scale: 7, Seed: 3957448115, Size: 512x704, Model hash: 60367007, Batch size: 4, Batch pos: 0, Denoising strength: 0.6, Clip skip: 2, First pass size: 0x0

meta.prompt: upload on e621, by Michael & Inessa Garmash,Ruan Jia, Pino Daeni, chunie, darkgem, anthro, male, (((nococklikehorsecock))), (((detailed fluffy fur))), detailed realistic painting, solo, (((shaded))) extreme detail, looking down, naked
meta.negativePrompt: extra limb, female, deformed blurry bad disfigured poorly drawn mutation mutated ugly (((out of focus))) depth of field focal blur (extra body parts) feral
